Simulate multivariate functional data

Source: R/00_mfd.R
data_sim_mfd.Rd

Simulate random coefficients and create a multivariate functional data object of class `mfd`.

data_sim_mfd(nobs = 5, nbasis = 4, nvar = 2, seed = 0)

Arguments

nobs

Number of functional observations to be simulated.
nbasis

Number of basis functions.
nvar

Number of functional covariates.
seed

Set seed for reproducibility.

Value

A simulated object of class `mfd`.

Examples

library(funcharts)
data_sim_mfd()

#> $coefs
#> , , var1
#> 
#>            rep1       rep2         rep3       rep4       rep5
#> [1,]  1.2629543  0.4146414 -0.005767173 -1.1476570  0.2522234
#> [2,] -0.3262334 -1.5399500  2.404653389 -0.2894616 -0.8919211
#> [3,]  1.3297993 -0.9285670  0.763593461 -0.2992151  0.4356833
#> [4,]  1.2724293 -0.2947204 -0.799009249 -0.4115108 -1.2375384
#> 
#> , , var2
#> 
#>            rep1        rep2        rep3       rep4       rep5
#> [1,] -0.2242679 -0.05710677 -1.28459935 -0.4333103  0.9921604
#> [2,]  0.3773956  0.50360797  0.04672617 -0.6494716 -0.4295131
#> [3,]  0.1333364  1.08576936 -0.23570656  0.7267507  1.2383041
#> [4,]  0.8041895 -0.69095384 -0.54288826  1.1519118 -0.2793463
#> 
#>

#> $call
